member.name: T:DotCompute.Generators.Cli.Commands.GenerateCudaSerializationCommand
member.summary: Command to generate CUDA serialization code for message types.

member.name: M:DotCompute.Generators.Cli.Commands.GenerateCudaSerializationCommand.GenerateCudaCodeAsync(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Compilation,System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates CUDA serialization code from the compilation. This is a simplified version that scans for IRingKernelMessage types.

member.name: T:DotCompute.Generators.Cli.Commands.GenerationResult
member.summary: Result of CUDA code generation, serialized to JSON for MSBuild consumption.

member.name: T:DotCompute.Generators.Cli.Program
member.summary: CLI tool for DotCompute code generation tasks. This tool runs in a separate process to avoid assembly version conflicts with consuming projects that reference Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.

member.name: T:DotCompute.Generators.Cli.Program.ExitCodes
member.summary: Exit codes for the CLI tool.
